hanzi-su-wiki:
係

Значения

Иметь отношение, иметь дело, зависеть; участок работы, порученное дело; ответственный за что-либо; коэффициент

Мнемоника

  • Справа — наращивать нитку на нитку 系. Человек 亻, который хранит и передаёт традиции, обеспечивая связь поколений и наращивание знаний.

  • "Люди связаны друг с другом как нити 糸 — зависят."

Варианты

系, 是
purpleculture_pinyin:
xì
to connect; to relate to; to tie up; to bind; to be (literary)
подключить; относиться к; связать; связывать; быть (литературным)

heisig_chinese_memo: Mr. T gets a DNA test, and discovers why it's so easy for him to relate to the people in charge after all. He was meant to be the person in charge.
heisig_constituent: person in charge, person, lineage, drop, thread, spiderman
Keyword_KANJIDIC: person in charge, connection, duty, concern oneself
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: Ответственное лицо, подключение, обязанность, относятся себя
koohiiStory1: Mister T gets a DNA test, and discovers that he was meant to be the person in charge after all.
koohiiStory2: The person in charge usually must come from a long standing lineage of persons in charge.
kunYomi: かか.る、かかり、-がかり、かか.わる
jp_example_words:
係り(かかり): official, duty, person in charge
係わる(かかわる): concern oneself in, have to do with, affect, influence
関係(かんけい): relationship
jp_readingExamples: 係る (かか.る), 係 (かかり)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A psychic leader can pick a thread up off the ground and make a connection with the person that it came from. This leader is very powerful, so even a thread is enough for them to make a psychic connection with the person who was wearing the thread.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine you are this leader and you just picked up this piece of thread from the ground. You get a jarring psychic connection with the owner of the thread. Your head spins, your heart races, and your hands tremble. Picture this happening to you as you pick up the thread from the ground.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: As you develop this psychic connection with the owner of the thread, you can tell that he is currently eating a cake (けい). Since the connection is so strong, you feel like you are eating the cake as well. It’s vanilla strawberry.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Because the connection is so strong, you feel like you too are eating the cake. You taste the fluffy and creamy vanilla strawberry flavors washing over your tongue. Imagine yourself eating this delectable cake. It’s fantastically delicious.
Ru_Meaning: person in charge, connection, duty, concern oneself
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 化 (превращаться), 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (亻) with a system (系) is in charge
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mr. T gets a DNA test, and discovers why it's so easy for him to relate to the people in charge after all. He was meant to be the person in charge.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " people " to " shito ", like a rope tied to the neck of a person. Or increased from two " and " (hand), tying the display operation. The original meaning is tied. Oracle is used as a verb to indicate binding. Warring States Bronze " people " and " deserves " to separate, as this is a small seal. Bronze writing is used as a person's name. "Shuowen": "Shuya. From the person to the line, the line is also the sound." "Yi‧ Kan": "The line uses the emblem, placed in the thorns, and cannot be three-year-old. Fierce." "Mandarin ‧ Yue Chinese" "If you regard the crimes of the Yue Kingdom as unforgivable, you will burn the Zongmiao, tie your wife to the river, and you will die in the river. Five thousand people with armours will die, you must have a spouse." Wei Zhao's note: "Tie, tie. and also."

" Department " is also used as a prisoner. "Yi‧ Sui": "To stick to the relationship is to follow Weizhi, and the king Yongheng is in Xishan."

" Tie " also means to maintain, that is, to connect things together so as not to fall apart. "Northern History-Qi Jishang": "Sun Teng thought that the imperial court was isolated and the emperor had no right to establish the emperor, and the public hoped for nothing."

"系" is also used as a verb " being " in modern Chinese. "Water Margin" Chapter 3: "The capture and killing of Zheng Tu prisoner Lu Da, that is, the jurisdiction of the government." Today, Cantonese still uses " line " as the verb " being ".
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from " person " from "糸", the original meaning is tied.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「人」從「糸」，象以繩索綁繫人的頸部之形。或增從兩「又」(手形)，顯示綁繫之動作。本義是綁繫。甲骨文用作動詞，表示縛繫。戰國金文「人」和「糸」分開，為小篆所本。金文用作人名。《說文》：「絜束也。从人从系，系亦聲。」《易‧坎》：「係用徽纆，置於叢棘，三歲不得。凶。」《國語‧越語上》：「若以越國之罪為不可赦也，將焚宗廟，係妻拏，沈金玉於江，有帶甲五千人將以致死，乃必有偶。」韋昭注：「係，繫也。」

　　「係」也用作拘囚。《易‧隨》：「拘係之，乃從維之，王用亨於西山。」

　　「係」還表示維繫，即將事物聯結起來，使不渙散。《北史‧齊紀上》：「孫騰以為朝廷隔絕，不權立天子，則眾望無所係。」

　　「係」在近、現代漢語中還用作系動詞「是」。《水滸傳》第3回：「捕捉打死鄭屠犯人魯達，即係經略府提轄。」今天粵語仍沿用「係」作系動詞「是」的用法。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「人」從「糸」，本義是綁繫。

Chinese Definition: Antonyms: 解
Ideographic: Someone 亻 who connects 系 people; 系 also provides the pronunciation
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 亻 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 系 [ xì ] system; line, link, connection
①有聯屬關係的：系統。系列。係數。水系。世系。
②高等學校中按學科分的教學單位：中文系。化學系。
③關聯：干係。關係。
④聯結，栓：繫縛。系絆。繫馬。維繫。名譽所繫。
⑤牽掛：繫戀。繫念。
⑥是：確係實情。
⑦把人或東西捆住上提或向下送：從井下把土繫上來。
⑧某些學科中分類的名稱：漢藏(zàng)語系。寒武系(地質學名詞)。
⑨詞賦末尾結束全文之詞，如“系曰”。
⑩解。

甲骨文從「 人 」從「 糸 」，象以繩索綁繫人的頸部之形。或增從兩「 又 」(手形)，顯示綁繫之動作。本義是綁繫。甲骨文用作動詞，表示縛繫。戰國金文「 人 」和「 糸 」分開，為小篆所本。金文用作人名。《說文》：「絜束也。从人从系，系亦聲。」《易‧坎》：「係用徽纆，置於叢棘，三歲不得。凶。」《國語‧越語上》：「若以越國之罪為不可赦也，將焚宗廟，係妻拏，沈金玉於江，有帶甲五千人將以致死，乃必有偶。」韋昭注：「係，繫也。」 「 係 」也用作拘囚。《易‧隨》：「拘係之，乃從維之，王用亨於西山。」 「 係 」還表示維繫，即將事物聯結起來，使不渙散。《北史‧齊紀上》：「孫騰以為朝廷隔絕，不權立天子，則眾望無所係。」 「 係 」在近、現代漢語中還用作系動詞「 是 」。《水滸傳》第3回：「捕捉打死鄭屠犯人魯達，即係經略府提轄。」今天粵語仍沿用「 係 」作系動詞「 是 」的用法。
Oracle from " people" to " shito", like a rope tied to the neck of a person. Or increased from two " and" (hand), tying the display operation. The original meaning is tied. Oracle is used as a verb to indicate binding. Warring States Bronze " people" and " deserves" to separate, as this is a small seal. Bronze writing is used as a person's name. "Shuowen": "Shuya. From the person to the line, the line is also the sound." "Yi‧ Kan": "The line uses the emblem, placed in the thorns, and cannot be three-year-old. Fierce." "Mandarin ‧ Yue Chinese" "If you regard the crimes of the Yue Kingdom as unforgivable, you will burn the Zongmiao, tie your wife to the river, and you will die in the river. Five thousand people with armours will die, you must have a spouse." Wei Zhao's note: "Tie, tie. and also." " Department" is also used as a prisoner. "Yi‧ Sui": "To stick to the relationship is to follow Weizhi, and the king Yongheng is in Xishan." " Tie" also means to maintain, that is, to connect things together so as not to fall apart. "Northern History-Qi Jishang": "Sun Teng thought that the imperial court was isolated and the emperor had no right to establish the emperor, and the public hoped for nothing." " 系" is also used as a verb " being" in modern Chinese. "Water Margin" Chapter 3: "The capture and killing of Zheng Tu prisoner Lu Da, that is, the jurisdiction of the government." Today, Cantonese still uses " line" as the verb " being".

係字的基本解释

係
xì
同“系1”③⑥。

係字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》古詣切，去霽，見。］
［《集韻》胡計切，去霽，匣。］
“系3”的繁体字。
(1)束缚；捆绑。
(2)指拘囚。
(3)将人或物体用绳索等物捆扎起来，悬吊于另一物体之上。
(4)指带子、绳索。
(5)把事物联结统一於某一方面或集中到某一点上。参见“係統”、“係心”、“係意”。
(6)继续；接续。
(7)决定，指某一事物发挥的作用，决定着另一事物的成敗得失。
(8)缀；置。
(9)维系，指将事物联结聚集起来，使不涣散。
(10)关联；牵涉。
(11)掳掠。
(12)志，记。
(13)是。

係字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　係； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页104第04
【集韻】【韻會】?同繫。【爾雅·釋詁】係，繼也。【疏】係者，繫屬之繼。【易·隨卦】係小子，失丈夫。　又【左傳·僖二十五年】秦人過析，隈入而係輿人，以圍商密。昏而傅焉。【註】係，縛也。又【襄十八年】獻子以朱絲係玉二瑴。　又與曳同。【莊子·山木篇】正緳係履而見魏王。

係字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
係字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xì］
["Guangyun" ancient legends cut, go to Ji, see. ]
["Ji Yun" Hu Ji cut, go to Ji, Xie. ]
"系3" in traditional characters.
(1) Restraint; binding.
(2) Refers to prisoners.
(3) Bind people or objects with ropes and other objects and hang them on another object.
(4) Refers to straps and ropes.
(5) Unify the connection of things in a certain aspect or concentrate on a certain point. See "system", "association", "association".
(6) Continue; continue.
(7) Decision refers to the role played by one thing, which determines the success or failure of another thing.
(8) Fix; set.
(9) Maintaining means connecting things together so as not to fall apart.
(10) Association; involvement.
(11) Captivity.
(12) Chi, record.
(13) Yes.
system

[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　 Department; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 104 04
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club]? Same department. 【Erya·Shigu】Department, continued. 【Sparse】The line is the successor of the genus. [Yi·Sui Gua] He is a kid who has lost her husband.　[Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-five Years] The Qin people analyzed, and they entered the public to enclose the secrets of the trade. Faint and Fu Yan. [Note] Department, tie also. Also 【Eighteen Years of Xiang】 Presented his son with Zhusi to tie the jade two 瑴.　The same with trolling again. [Zhuangzi·Mountain and Wood Chapter] I see the king of Wei when I am walking.

xì
вм. 系

係

Значения

Иметь отношение, иметь дело, зависеть; участок работы, порученное дело; ответственный за что-либо; коэффициент

Мнемоника

  • Справа — наращивать нитку на нитку 系. Человек 亻, который хранит и передаёт традиции, обеспечивая связь поколений и наращивание знаний.

  • "Люди связаны друг с другом как нити 糸 — зависят."

Варианты

系, 是

Radicals: ｲ, 一, 糸  (leader, ground, thread)
Meaning Mnemonic
A psychic leader can pick a thread up off the ground and make a connection with the person that it came from. This leader is very powerful, so even a thread is enough for them to make a psychic connection with the person who was wearing the thread.
Imagine you are this leader and you just picked up this piece of thread from the ground. You get a jarring psychic connection with the owner of the thread. Your head spins, your heart races, and your hands tremble. Picture this happening to you as you pick up the thread from the ground.
Reading Mnemonic
As you develop this psychic connection with the owner of the thread, you can tell that he is currently eating a cake (けい). Since the connection is so strong, you feel like you are eating the cake as well. It’s vanilla strawberry.
Because the connection is so strong, you feel like you too are eating the cake. You taste the fluffy and creamy vanilla strawberry flavors washing over your tongue. Imagine yourself eating this delectable cake. It’s fantastically delicious.

Фонетик: 系 (ケイ система).
